specialMeasures.Two Week Intersection:
SELECT
  THETA_SKETCH_ESTIMATE(
    THETA_SKETCH_INTERSECT(
      APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT_DS_THETA(upm_id_thetasketch) FILTER (WHERE (stream_view_count > 0 or inbox_view_count > 0 or thread_view_count > 0) and %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '14' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY),
      APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT_DS_THETA(upm_id_thetasketch) FILTER (WHERE (stream_view_count > 0 or inbox_view_count > 0 or thread_view_count > 0) and %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}%)
    )
  )
FROM "%{Table}%"
WHERE %{TimelessFilter}% AND %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '14' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}%
specialMeasures.Current Week:
SELECT APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT_DS_THETA(upm_id_thetasketch) FILTER (WHERE (stream_view_count > 0 or inbox_view_count > 0 or thread_view_count > 0) and %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}%)
FROM "%{Table}%"
WHERE %{TimelessFilter}% AND %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}%
specialMeasures.Prior Week:
SELECT APPROX_COUNT_DISTINCT_DS_THETA(upm_id_thetasketch) FILTER (WHERE (stream_view_count > 0 or inbox_view_count > 0 or thread_view_count > 0) and  %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '14' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY)
FROM "%{Table}%"
WHERE %{TimelessFilter}% AND %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '14' DAY <= __time and __time < %{StartDate}% - INTERVAL '7' DAY
